author: Crunchyroll
description:
Khleo Thomas who played Hector “Zero” Zeroni in Holes is showing off his INCREDIBLE anime and video game collection (get ready to be jealous), sharing his favorite anime moments and so much more.

Welcome to The Anime Effect, the weekly podcast hosted by Crunchyroll's own in-house, resident anime experts – Nicholas Friedman, LeAlec Murray, and Leah President. The show is a lively mixture of roundtable news and discussion with Crunchyroll hosts and special guests as they debate hot topics, provide recommendations, and tackle fan questions. 

Have a question for The Anime Effect? Ask it here: https://got.cr/ae-ask

To bring your brand to life in this podcast, email podcastadsales@sonymusic.com.

Crunchyroll brings you the latest clips, openings, full episodes, and more from your favorite anime!

#AnimeEffect #Anime #Crunchyroll
title: Does Khleo Thomas from Holes Have the GREATEST Collection of All Time? | The Anime Effect #85

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 2: The world is flipped on its head! Watch SI-VIS: The Sound of Heroes on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-svtsoh

ABOUT SI-VIS: THE SOUND OF HEROES
SI-VIS is a co-ed music group, led by Yosuke, shaking up the global music scene with their unmatched vocals and performances. However, they are actually heroes in disguise, battling against mysterious forces threatening the world. They convert audience energy at live performances into combat power. Luckily, the battles appear to be ordinary concerts to the public, keeping their identity a secret.

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 2: The Blood Mad Duke gives a gift to his soon to be wife! Watch Pass the Monster Meat, Milady! on Crunchyroll: https://got.cr/cc-ptmmm

Any proper noble lady must cultivate refined tastes, and Lady Melphiera’s delicacy of choice is…monsters! Unfortunately, society frowns upon such unladylike cravings and brands her the “Voracious Villainess.” At a banquet, she’s attacked by a monster, only to be saved by the feared “Blood-Mad Duke.” He’s brutal, mysterious, and charming. Could he be the one to appreciate her monstrous appetite?

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 3: Hinako really wants to get eaten. This Monster Wants to Eat me on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-tmwtem

ABOUT THIS MONSTER WANTS TO EAT ME
Hinako, a high school student with a dark past, lives alone in a town by the sea. Haunted by a constant sensation of drowning, she can barely go through the motions of her tedious life…until the day a monster tries to eat her! After passing out in the struggle, she awakens to find she’s been rescued by a beautiful mermaid. However, salvation comes at a cost—the mermaid’s protection will last only until Hinako has matured into the perfect meal! Hinako’s first instinct isn’t to run or scream, though, and an unlikely relationship between monster and prey unfolds… “I’ve come to devour you."

ABOUT CRUNCHYROLL
Crunchyroll is the place to watch all your favorite anime! Stream new anime, full episodes, movies, OVAs, music, openings, endings, trailers and all the best moments in anime, subbed and dubbed!

title: Pre-Meal Pillow Talk | This Monster Wants to Eat me

Monkey D. Luffy refuses to let anyone or anything stand in the way of his quest to become the king of all pirates. With a course charted for the treacherous waters of the Grand Line and beyond, this is one captain who'll never give up until he's claimed the greatest treasure on Earth: the Legendary One Piece!
